messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] rambling topics
messages.msgSnippet: LOL he s glad I m not sheltering myself only among other believers anymore...I did that for awhile trying to be the perfect Christian..didn t work..If I was
messages.messageBody:
LOL he's glad I'm not sheltering myself only among other believers anymore...I did that for awhile trying to be the perfect Christian..didn't work..If I was really that perfect I'd have to be crucified for it and well, that's just not going to happen. I've loosened up and we're all alot happier.

MamaBeth

Ren <starsuncloud@...> wrote:

"Paul asked me once just why I like this email group so much...and I said it's
because I've finally found a bunch of women who wander as they talk from one
subject to another just like I do!"

But we could be unwitting vehicles of Satan.
You're getting parenting advice from a bunch of folks that don't believe...is that safe?:)

Ren, stirring the pot


"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
